dict.string: This app collects data passively from your phone to help understand if the collected data could help to diagnose ADHD.
This app utilizes motion data by inputting the data into a machine learning model with the intent of uncovering any possible links to a potential ADHD symptoms.
This app utilizes device usage data by inputting the data into a machine learning model with the intent of uncovering any possible links to a potential ADHD symptoms.
This app utilizes keyboard metric data data by inputting the data into a machine learning model with the intent of uncovering any possible links to a potential ADHD symptoms.
This app utilizes data from the messages app by inputting the data into a machine learning model with the intent of uncovering any possible links to a potential ADHD symptoms.
This app utilizes pedometer and step data by inputting the data into a machine learning model with the intent of uncovering any possible links to a potential ADHD symptoms.
This app utilizes phone usage data by inputting the data into a machine learning model with the intent of uncovering any possible links to a potential ADHD symptoms.
This app utilizes data on location visits by inputting the data into a machine learning model with the intent of uncovering any possible links to a potential ADHD symptoms.
This app utilizes speech metrics data by inputting the data into a machine learning model with the intent of uncovering any possible links to a potential ADHD symptoms.
